thread.title: Liv Tyler set to star in Guy Fawkes drama Gunpowder alongside Game of Thrones' Kit Harington
thread.title_full: Liv Tyler set to star in Guy Fawkes drama Gunpowder alongside Game of Thrones' Kit Harington

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Liv Tyler set to star in Guy Fawkes drama Gunpowder alongside Game of Thrones' Kit Harington
text:
Liv Tyler set to star in Guy Fawkes drama Gunpowder alongside Game of Thrones' Kit Harington Steven Tyler's daughter is set to lend some Tinsel Town magic to the BBC drama Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
She shot to global stardom thanks to her portrayal of Arwen the Elf in Peter Jackson's Lord of The Rings trilogy. 
And now Liv Tyler is set to bring her considerable star power to the small screen alongside Kit Harington, as reports state she's signed on for the BBC drama, Gunpowder. 
The 39-year-old actress has allegedly agreed to take on a role in the three-part series alongside the Game of Thrones lead, 30, which will revolve around the events of November 1605. Read More Make up-free Liv Tyler, 39, shows off her natural beauty with adorable family snap on Instagram Plotting a move to the small screen? 
The Sun reports that the actress is the latest big name to sign up for the drama, which so far only has Kit confirmed - rumoured to be playing the role, Robert Catesby. 
Speaking to the newspaper, a source said: "There have been rumours about this project from the middle of last year. The addition of Liv gives the show a real class leading lady." 
Also rumoured to have signed up for the show is Sherlock writer and star, Mark Gatiss. Read More Liv Tyler has reportedly signed up to star alongside Kit Harington in BBC drama, Gunpowder (Photo: Getty) 
Mirror Celeb has reached out to a representative of Liv for comment. 
The latest swirling of rumours surrounding Liv and Gunpowder come after Deadline reported both she and Gatis had signed on to the drama. 
The website reports both Kit and Liv, along with Mark, have all been "confirmed" for the drama. 
Gunpowder will see reportedly see Kit play Robert Catesby, the original architect of the Catholic plot to destroy the Protestant parliament and King, though it is not known who will take on the role of Guy Fawkes himself. The 30-year-old Game of Thrones star will play gunpowder plot architect, Roebrt Catesby (Photo: Getty) Liv, 39, is rumoured to be attached in an unknown role (Photo: Getty) 
The plot will see Catesby go to desperate lengths to save his faith and fellow Catholics, after he is unable to stand by while they suffer - despite the peaceful protestations of a Jesuit priest. 
The cunning Cateseby then recruits friends and relatives, swearing them to secrecy as he devises an audacious plan to rid the land of King James I. 
Production on the drama series is slated to start in February. Read More
